amendment.description: To make available, from amounts appropriated for Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Army, $10,000,000 for the Broad Area Unmanned Responsive Resupply Operations aircraft program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3522 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3522 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Dodd. (consideration: CR S7379; text: CR S7379) To make available, from amounts appropriated for Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Army, $10,000,000 for the Broad Area Unmanned Responsive Resupply Operations aircraft program.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3522 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3522 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Dodd.
